overview:
Contemporary lighting and funky home accessories ecommerce retailer from Dutch designers. New contemporary lighting, chandeliers and funky home accessories.

Passionate about Dutch design, Dutch By Design offers contemporary lighting and funky home accessories that are hard to find. We were the first to introduce many new designs to the UK, including Tord Boontjeâ€™s Midsummer and Icarus light and designs from up-and-coming designers. Our range includes: contemporary lighting, funky home accessories, chandeliers, pendant lights, table lights, furniture, clocks, mirrors and designer tableware Browse our gift ideas section to get inspiration for the perfect gift.
